CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.transformation AS SELECT t.id, s.name AS service, r.name AS resource, b.name AS product, t.sequence_number, at.name AS assign_to, rk.name AS resource_key, bk.name AS product_key, relk.name AS relationship_key, a.name AS attribute, bar.name AS product_attribute_resource FROM ruleform.transformation t JOIN ruleform.product s ON t.service = s.id JOIN ruleform.resource r ON t.resource = r.id JOIN ruleform.product b ON t.product = b.id JOIN ruleform.resource at ON t.assign_to = at.id JOIN ruleform.resource rk ON t.resource_key = rk.id JOIN ruleform.product bk ON t.product_key = bk.id JOIN ruleform.relationship relk ON t.relationship_key = relk.id JOIN ruleform.attribute a ON t.attribute = a.id JOIN ruleform.resource bar ON t.product_attribute_resource = bar.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.transformation OWNER TO core;
